column4: GNOME question: I killed a GNOME session with Ctrl-Alt-Backspace, and now it won't load completely anymore (no panels, menus, etc).  How can I 'reset' GNOME to a sane/default state?
.oO(c'mon gnome-heads, this should be a slam-dunk question, no?)
that happened to me the other day and I just reset my machine and everything was fine
I'll try the reboot but I'm skeptical -  reboot really should not be necessary or sufficient IMHO
hehe - thanks for your unconventional advice ;-)
